pull_request.title: Fix/168620 www.m2o.it , fix/168622 www.deejay.it , update/152345 www.capital.it

comment.body:
What about move 
`leanplayer.com,player.899thewave.fm,player.cjcbradio.com,player.max983.ca,repubblica.it#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-visible .iubenda-cs-accept-btn')`
 under `! iubenda CMP` section?

Then, is 
`video.repubblica.it#%#AG_onLoad(function() { setTimeout(function() { var el = document.querySelector('button.iubenda-cs-accept-btn'); if(el) el.click(); }, 5E3); });`
needed despite
`repubblica.it#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-visible .iubenda-cs-accept-btn')`
?

As concerns
`ilmattino.it,leggo.it,3bmeteo.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-visible button.iubenda-cs-close-btn')`
`leggo.it` and `3bmeteo.com` can be added to
`m2o.it,deejay.it,capital.it,moto.it,automoto.it,atlantico.fr,movieplayer.it,mediaset.it,libero.it#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-customize-btn')`
`m2o.it,deejay.it,capital.it,moto.it,automoto.it,atlantico.fr,movieplayer.it,mediaset.it,libero.it#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '#iubFooterBtn')`
while `ilmattino.it` requires more attention (also with the current filter)

issue.title: mail.yandex.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.yandex.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F) ### Comment > Когда я открываю Яндекс Почту в Яндекс Браузере или в одноименном приложении Яндекс Браузера, я вижу только чистый лист без каких-либо данных. > Проблема возникла после установки приложения AdGuard на компьютер. До этого Почта работала, хотя в Яндекс Браузере было включено бесплатное расширение AdGuard. Username: `@otomi` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

AdGuard Base

AdGuard French Other extensions used: | Антишок, Блокировщик мешающей рекламы (в составе Яндекс.Браузера)

comment.body:
As regard `maxstream.video`
anti-adblock issue still present on my end
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1375223/371ff0b9-7bc2-4c94-9b70-19adc69c233c
pounder script (blocked) set these var:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1375223/f6849089-2ee6-426a-8910-bda73091af6e
anti-adblock script check these vars:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1375223/65ca8ac5-7e1a-44f8-ba8d-78cc507c0c54
As of now only `qweasd` is involved on my end:
`maxstream.video#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'qweasd', 'true')`
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1375223/24525e97-42e8-49bf-8ed9-41728b984412
but I suppose that is only a case.
